channel.description: As I get on the yellow cart and leave the satellite launch area, the game starts to load the Apprehension level. Here I get a Crash (attached) When ever I reload my saved game, and try to move off the level and onto the Apprehension level; I get the same crash. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T18_52_15C0.mdmp (95.7 KB)

item.title: [Crash] Loading "Apprehension" level
item.dc:creator: lukewarmdog
item.description:
sp4mm0nkey:

As I was completely stuck - Can’t get to play any further.

I have resorted to loading the MAP manually - which works.

Open the Options
Go to Keyboard (Tab)
Click Advanced (button)
Check the ~ Developer Console

Now bring up the console in game with the ¬ key (key to the left of your number 1 key)

Enter the command
map bm_ca3a

This loads up the level APPREHENSION

Hope this helps others.

Number missing from map ref -
Should be map bm_c2a3a
